## SendableEthersStabilio class

Ethers-based implementation of [SendableStabilio](./lib-base.sendablestabilio.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SendableEthersStabilio implements SendableStabilio<EthersTransactionReceipt, EthersTransactionResponse> 
```

|  [registerFrontend(kickbackRate, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersstabilio.registerfrontend.md) |  | Register current wallet address as a Stabilio frontend. |
|  [repayXBRL(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersstabilio.repayxbrl.md) |  | Adjust existing Trove by repaying some of its debt. |

|  [transferCollateralGainToTrove(overrides)](./lib-ethers.sendableethersstabilio.transfercollateralgaintotrove.md) |  | Transfer [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) from Stability Deposit to Trove. |
